title: The Hard-Shelled Lobster
description: Lobsters are large marine crustaceans with ten legs, two of which have claws. They are found on the seafloor and are known for their long lifespans.

questions.question: How do lobsters breathe?
options: Through gills located on their legs
questions.correct_answer: Through gills located on their legs

questions.question: What is the collective noun for a group of lobsters?
A lobster's claws are used for what?
Which of these is true about a lobster's shell?
options: It can regenerate if it is damaged
It is shed as the lobster grows
questions.correct_answer: It is shed as the lobster grows

questions.question: What is unique about a lobster's brain?
options: It has a very large brain for its size
It is located in its claws
It has a brain that is split in two
